WorkItem.Description:
Issue: 
Options in the TankDK module do not persist, display-wise. These options include, but may not be limited to:
Boss Attack Speed
Incoming Damage Per Shot
% Incoming From Magic
While the values set for these will still be calculated, the display will reset to their original values on next load. This can make knowing your current settings rather difficult.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Load up a file for the TankDK Module.
2. Change Boss Attack Speed to 2.0
3. Change Incoming Damage Per Shot to 25000
4. Take note of values
5. Save file.
6. Close Rawr.
7. Reload character file.
 
Values should display intial values (2.5 attack speed, 10000 dmg per shot), rather than the ones previously entered. Calculations still act on the saved values (2.0/25000).

Comments.Message: Yeah, I thought I fixed this, but it looks like it's failing again.  Opening.
